source.name: ParamExpansion
source.instructions: Click the button below to submit your response.
source.guidance:
We can set the appropriate variable using the syntax below.

```
title="Avatar: The Last Airbender"
```

We can also use the example below to replace characters with parameter expansion.

```
echo ${title//a/_}
```

sequence.feedback: Be sure to set the title variable to the correct value.
Be sure to use echo and parameter expansion to replace all a's
